description.en:
Hana no Aru Seikatsu (A Flower's Life):

"Iyokawa, your nipples are way too amazing. Satisfying yourself with that cute voice, you asshole. Help me get rid of this erection somehow?"

"Senpai... although you're always being nice to me, sorry for thinking you were sexually harassing me..."

An eternally horny couple's perverted love comedy!!

Also contains 3 stories:
- Aseru
Kazuo is obsessed with his friend's older brother, Yuudai. When Tsutomu hits his Yuudai, stunning him, Kazuo decides to take advantage... and he doesn't care if either Yuudai or Tsutomu like it.

- Misshitsu
Kazuo is obsessed with his friend's older brother, Yuudai. Kazuo tracks him down and keeps him prisoner, taking what he wants from Yuudai's body everyday. Is it love or is it hate?

- Neji
